verses.name: 1 Chronicles 19:13
verses.text: Be of good courage, and let us behave ourselves valiantly for our people, and for the cities of our God: and let the Lord do that which is good in his sight.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 19:14
verses.text: So Joab and the people that were with him drew nigh before the Syrians unto the battle; and they fled before him.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 19:15
verses.text: And when the children of Ammon saw that the Syrians were fled, they likewise fled before Abishai his brother, and entered into the city. Then Joab came to Jerusalem.
